page.title: 07FLEETVILLE SHOPS:ST.ALBANS
page.content: There are lots of shops in Fleetville but they are cramped up together. There are too many similar kinds of shop which means a lack of variety of goods. There is only one supermarket, the Co-op. The other shops are D.I.Y. stores, newsagents, greengrocers, motor car sales and garages, glass cutting, confectionery, off licence, launderette and public houses. In our{survey}people said that Fleetville was dirty, dull and untidy. They said that the flow of traffic was too much and parking space too little. They commented on the friendly services in the shops and on the need for longer opening hours.
